message: - Update to avoid an NPE in case of a not provided FLASHPLAYER_DEBUGGER environment variable
ModuleExample was failing due to NPE
try to get better error handling for a reported NPE
report error instead of NPE if namespace isn't right

Fix NPE

If '-output' is left out of the cli arguments, and no '-load-config' is specified, an uncaught NPE was thrown

Signed-off-by: Erik de Bruin <erik@ixsoftware.nl>
Added a null-check to prevent NPEs in case of interfaces annotated with [Bindable]

Fix NPE

This time such that the diff looks nicer ;-)

Signed-off-by: Erik de Bruin <erik@ixsoftware.nl>

Various checks for NPE situations not encountered in FlexJS

Signed-off-by: Erik de Bruin <erik@ixsoftware.nl>

FLEX-33252 Falcon NPE in FlexFXG2SWFTranscoder Moved definitions initialization to constructor, in some cases recursion would not call transcode() which would result in the NPE

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/flex/falcon/trunk@1409271 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Falcon: Added three nontrivial tests for parsing <Object> tag, and fixed an NPE that was causing two of them to fail.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/flex/falcon/trunk@1405174 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

FLEX-33713: An NPE is thrown by this code when compiling 'spark.swc' from the SDK. The null check bypasses the issue, it doesn't do anything to fix the root cause...

Signed-off-by: Erik de Bruin <erik@ixsoftware.nl>
